data.actual_result: pop-up text box contains \_@X with the cursor at the beginning
data.expected_result: pop up text box should contain @X\_ with the cursor at the end where the underscore is
data.short_description: Cursor goes to wrong place in friends search
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to <discordapp.com/channels/@me> - click the box labeled "Find or start a conversation" in the upper left - type a letter into the box, X for example
